original_text: You know what happened to us before we came to you. The people at Philippi had done bad things to us. They had caused us to have trouble. When we came to you, our God helped us to be brave. We were not afraid to tell you his good news. Many people tried to stop us, but we told you God's message.
korean_text: 너희가 아는 바와 같이 우리가 먼저 빌립보에서 고난과 능욕을 당하였으나 우리 하나님을 힘입어 많은 싸움 중에 하나님의 복음을 너희에게 전하였노라

sentences.original_text: You know what happened to us
sentences.korean_translation: 우리에게 무슨 일이 일어났는지 너희는 안다

sentences.original_text: The people at Philippi had done bad things to us
sentences.korean_translation: 빌립보 사람들이 우리에게 나쁜 일을 했었다

sentences.original_text: They had caused us to have trouble
our God helped us to be brave
to tell you his good news
Many people tried to stop us
but we told you God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리는 너희에게 하나님의 메시지를 전했다
